item.title: CVE-2024-49335|2024-10-20T13:50:29.213Z -- edush%20maxim -- googledrive%20folder%20list
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Edush Maxim GoogleDrive folder list allows Stored XSS.This issue affects GoogleDrive folder list: from n/a through 2.2.2.
